text: Salvatore Bellomo (June 18, 1951 â€“ February 9, 2019) was a Belgian professional wrestler. His career spanned more than thirty years. He was born in Hornu, Belgium, but raised in Racalmuto, Sicily, Italy. He performed with WWF and Extreme Championship Wrestling. Bellomo died from stomach cancer on February 9, 2019 at the age of 67.Former WWF and ECW Star Salvatore Bellomo Passes Away at 67 ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Belgian sportspeople Category:Wrestlers
